Flag Utility
============

Flag option utilities for the [command](https://github.com/freeformsystems/cli-command) module, a component of the [toolkit](https://github.com/freeformsystems/cli-toolkit).

## Install

```
npm i cli-flag-util
```

## Test

```
npm test
```
